title: Top Democrat Grills Capitol Police About Lawmaker Protection After Pelosi Attack
description: Representative Zoe Lofgren, Democrat of California and the chairwoman of the Administration Committee, raised questions in a lengthy letter to J. Thomas Manger, the Capitol Police chief.
media:description: Representative Zoe Lofgren questioned several of the Capitol Policeâ€™s practices after the attack on Paul Pelosi.
